OOB Automation is looking for Embedded Engineer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • System Design: Designing the architecture and specifications of embedded systems based on project requirements and constraints
  • Embedded Software Development: Writing embedded software using programming languages like C, C++, or assembly language to control hardware and execute specific functions
  • Hardware Integration: Collaborating with hardware engineers to integrate software with hardware components, sensors, and peripherals
  • Testing and Debugging: Conducting tests, debugging software, and troubleshooting hardware-software integration issues to ensure proper functionality
  • Optimization: Optimizing embedded systems for performance, power consumption, and resource utilization
  • Documentation: Creating documentation, including design specifications, user manuals, and technical documents related to the embedded system
  • Compliance and Standards: Ensuring that embedded systems comply with industry standards, regulations, and safety requirements

Skills and Qualifications:

  • Embedded Systems Knowledge: Understanding of embedded systems architecture, microcontrollers, microprocessors, and hardware-software interaction
  • Programming Skills: Proficiency in programming languages commonly used in embedded systems development, such as C, C++, or assembly language
  • Hardware Knowledge: Familiarity with hardware components, digital and analog circuits, sensors, and communication protocols (eg, SPI, I2C, UART)
  • Debugging and Testing: Ability to use debugging tools and perform testing to identify and resolve issues in embedded systems
  • Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving skills to address challenges related to system integration, performance, and optimization
